Basics

Data Biding

Data binding in Asic is the synchronization between the model and the view.

JavaScript

@Component({
    template: `
<div>
    <p>Inner component</p>
    <p>{{ text }}</p>
</div>`
})
class SimpleText {
    constructor() {
        this.text = 'Simple text'
    }
}
HTML

<SimpleText></SimpleText>

Composition

You can put one component into another.

JavaScript

@Component({
    template: `
<div>
    <p>{{ text }}</p>
    <SimpleText></SimpleText>
</div>`
})
class ComplexComponent {
    constructor() {
        this.text = 'Parent component'
    }
}
HTML

<ComplexComponent></ComplexComponent>

Events

You can add mouse events on any HTML element.

JavaScript

@Component({
    template: `
<div>
    <p>Clicks counter: {{ count }}</p>
    <button (click)="increment()">click</button>
</div>`
})
class Events {
    constructor() {
        this.count = 0;
    }
    increment() {
        this.count++;
    }
}
HTML

<Events></Events>

Loops

The *for directive repeats an HTML element

JavaScript

@Component({
    template: `
<ul>
    <li *for="item in items">
        {{ item }}
    </li>
</ul>`
})
class Loops {
    constructor() {
        this.items = ['javascript', 'python', 'ruby'];
    }
}
HTML

<Loops></Loops>

Samples

Timer

Javascript setInterval and setTimeout works fine.

JavaScript

@Component({
    template: `<p>Value: {{ count }}</p>`
})
class Timer {
    constructor() {
        this.count = 0;
        setInterval(() => {
            this.increment();
        }, 1000)
    }
    increment() {
        this.count++;
    }
}
HTML

<Timer></Timer>

Inner Loops

JavaScript

@Component({
    template: `
<div>
    <p>Active skill: <strong>{{ activeSkill }}</strong></p>
    <ul>
        <li *for="item in items">
            <span>{{ item.name }} skills: <strong *for="skill in item.skills" (click)="setActive(skill)">{{ skill }} </strong></span>
            <SimpleText></SimpleText>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>`
})
class InnerLoops {
    constructor() {
        this.activeSkill = '';
        this.items = [
            {name: 'John', skills: ['javascript', 'java']},
            {name: 'Adam', skills: ['python', 'ruby', 'html']}
        ];
    }
    setActive(skill) {
        this.activeSkill = skill;
    }
}
HTML

<InnerLoops></InnerLoops>
